name: Hilton Garden Inn LAX/El Segundo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have just came back from Los Angeles 2 days ago, in which I have stayed in the Hilton Garden inn in el Segundo for 19 nights. I am missing the hotel so much because it has a great staff which are very kind and helpfull, also I missing the room. The room is super comfortable and super big. I have never been in a bad like the one in this hotel. I would recommend this hotel to everyone. I don´t think that you could be treathed better than the way they threat you in this hotel. Parking and internet is also complimentary. I really felt like I am at home in this hotel. I will visit this hotel again in the future if I ever go back to Los Angeles.
reviews.title: Brilliant, Perfect, Wonderful, Superb, Dream.

reviews.text: This is the best hotel ever stayed in.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ian
reviews.title: A pleasant surprise near the airport

reviews.text: Stayed here for 5 nights and it was an excellent choice. The rooms are large and feel new. The pool is lovely and beautifully landscaped. All the staff were very friendly - especially Scott and Tony behind the desk. It was in a quiet location despite being near the airport and next to a metro station. It is a few minutes from the freeway which makes it easy to get to all LA's attractions. There were free cookies between 5 and 6 and a business centre with 4 computers and a printer. Perfect for a family with teenagers!
reviews.title: Well worth the stay and perfect in every way!

reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised by this hotel. It was such great value, and the room was wonderful, both clean and comfortable, with luxurious seats and comfy bed. I wasn't a fan of the fleece bed topper, but apart from that, it was a great room.
reviews.title: Great start to our Family Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the hotel is very good, clean and confortable.Also the staff is very nice, ready to help you and give you touristic information. It also has a shuttle service from and to the airport.
reviews.title: very good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only bad word I have to say is thta we booked a 2 queen beds room, but when we arrived only a king bed room as left.
reviews.title: Delightful experience!!

reviews.text: The hotel is also close to venice and santa monica, but yiou need a car if you want to go anywhere, even if only go to the dinner. Breakfast was also very rich and good.
reviews.title: The Best!

reviews.text: We've been to Los Angeles 3 times in the past month. This is our first time staying at this hotel and we were quite impressed. This property far exceeded the hotels on our two previous stays: HGI in Montebello and Doubletree in Commerce.
reviews.title: PLEASANT STAY

reviews.text: Our king room, the indoor public areas, and the grounds were all immaculate and extremely well maintained. We saw people cleaning the public areas on multiple occasions during the weekend. Our room was in spotless condition and appeared new. We were very surprised to learn from the night manager, Tony, that the property is 10 years old. It truly does look new. Speaking of Tony, he is a gracious host who made us feel very welcome.
reviews.title: Great airport location, quick access to...

reviews.text: I can't say enough about how good this place is. I've stayed here twice now. New, well kept, excellent service, EXCELLENT breakfast buffet, friendly staff (particularly the shuttle bus driver). Very close to Manhattan Beach (they'll drop you off and pick you up again) so you have ample choice for restaurants, safe, and convenient to the airport.
reviews.title: Stay here! The best hotel near LAX.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for two nights over a weekend in early October. We needed to be close to our event at Hollywood Park Race Track and still be near enough to other area of the LA area to visit with friends. At first we were a bit taken aback by how remote the hotel seemed from the main streets leading out of LAX. The property is in a light industrial area - aerospace and a big toy company (think "Barbie"). The Garden Inn is also right next to a metro station.
reviews.title: A Little Out Of The Way - In A Good Way!

reviews.text: The front desk staff seemed genuinely friendly and helpful. On our way to our room after check-in we a little taken aback by all of the coffee cups and dinnerware that was placed in the hallway - some of which appeared to be left there for quite some time. But we trudged on to our room to find very spacious, clean and inviting respite from our travel.
reviews.title: My first Solo trip! Happy with hotel selection

reviews.text: (During the night I heard someone collecting the cups and dinnerware from the hallway and all the next day the hallways were clear of debris.) The debris in the hallways negatively affected our "cleanliness" rating of the property however.
reviews.title: Usual Garden Inn Standard, location not so good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The mattresses had twin settings for separate firmness selection and a quiet, comfortable good night's sleep was had by all during our stay.
reviews.title: Mediocre Bed - Great Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is not located on a busy street so you have easy quick and go access...but yet very close to the main interstates to LA or San Dieago....quick drive to beach (we recommend Manhatten Beach), but get there early for the closest parking space. Several eateries, drug stores, grocery stores, target, etc...all with in a 5-10 min drive........We did take one reviewers advice and requested a room on the oppisite side of the metro that runs by the hotel....all was good and quite....
reviews.title: Great Location,Clean and a professional and helpfull staff.
Probably the best hotel near LAX with great staff, restaurant & pool!
reviews.text: We needed a place to stay after our week long vacation in Southern California so that we were close to the airport the night before our flight. Upon check in, Tony informed me that I could return my rental vehicle that evening if I wanted to and that the hotel would give me a ride back, and that they had shuttles to the airport every half hour beginning at 4:30am. It sounded so great to not have to deal with that the next morning, I did return our vehicle, I called the hotel for a ride, and they were there in about 5 minutes! Thanks Tony, we really appreciated it!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had dinner at the hotel which I thought was great and was a decent price. The pool and hot tub were clean and my daughter and her friend loved it!! The rooms were very spacious, we had 2 queen beds, desk, nice flat panel tv and everything was clean. They also provided free cookies at the front desk and had a nice business center so that I was able to print off my boarding tickets. There was also free internet access as well and free parking. I felt very safe at the hotel even though it was near the airport. The only negative thing was that there is nothing nearby. No stores, or restaurants, so you either have to drive yourself somewhere to eat, or eat at the hotel. The hotel also provided a buffet breakfast but we didn't try it since we needed to leave early for our flight. The shuttle was right on time and we made it to the airport within 5 minutes. I would definitely stay here again, if I needed to be close to the airport.
reviews.title: Superb! Great Location. Great Staff...

reviews.text: We stayed here for 9 nights in July. Were we on a budget so could not afford to stay on the beach in Santa Monica / Venice Beach. This really was a blessing in disguise. We were worried the hotel would be in a horrible area and with no amenities etc. We were wrong. Area is great if you have a car. Santa Monica / Venice beach is a short journey away. Your out of the traffic areas. We were greeted by Roxanne on reception. She was a lovely lady who was full of knowledge and very helpfull. They put us in a great room. No noise at nights. Pool is nice a cool. Jacuzzi is nice and Hot. Rooms are very good and clean. 5pm every day you hety free Cookies! There is free (yep TOTALLY Free) Wirleless throughout the hotel. There is also a roon witha few PC's, printer etc. Totally free to use. You can print off anything you want at no charge (We came from the MGM in las Vegas - ALL costs lots of mone there!!) The car parking is also safe and free. The gym was a little small. Not up to par for me but to burn a few calories its ok.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Scott the Manager is a great guy. Very helpfull.....The food was great.
reviews.title: Perfect for early morning flight out of LA

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Lax/El Segundo Hotel
